entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Drizzle or showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain at times heavy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
